resources.string:
My name is Liesl 
Gounden-Wentzel and 
I am a wife and mother 
of 2 boys, Alex (6) and 
Callen (1).

 I consider myself a 
perfectionist in everything I do.


I have a diploma in Multimedia Technology and have worked in the graphic design field but my passion lies with programming, especially JAVA.


I have exceptional skills in Adobe Photoshop, Corel Draw, Python programming, JAVA and Android Development.


My hobbies are Scuba diving and puzzles.


In the future, I hope to be an accomplished programmer and a role model to anyone wanting to enter the field of IT.


I am a team player and consider myself good within leadership roles.
